name: Kitty Vacation
description:
Tired of your dead end job? Take a vacation to an island in the middle of nowhere and live out your fantasies of being a cute cat 💕

👛 Collect coins
👚 Buy outfits
🦑 Avoid getting robbed by a squid. 
❓ ...And more!

Controls:
🛶 Boat minigame: Click to go up, let go to go down
🧩 Squid minigame: Click on pieces to move them
👗 Dress up: Click on clothes to move them

💾 The game saves automatically at set points

(Shout out to Kevin Macleod for all the good music!)

If you want to support what I do, feel free to buy me a coffee :)
